import urllib.parse

def extract_domain(url):
    parsed_url = urllib.parse.urlparse(url)
    domain = parsed_url.netloc
    if domain.startswith(''):
        domain = domain[4:]
    return domain

import urllib.parse

def extract_domain(url):
    parsed_url = urllib.parse.urlparse(url)
    domain = parsed_url.netloc
    if domain.startswith('www.'):
        domain = domain[5:]
    return domain

    if domain.startswith('www.'):

import urllib.parse

def extract_domain(url):
    parsed_url = urllib.parse.urlparse(url)
    domain = parsed_url.netloc
    if domain.startswith('www.'):
        domain = domain[-4:]
    return domain
